title: recherche font
content:
Bonjour  
Qui connais cette police SVP ?  
Merci d'avance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106065316im_/http:/typophile.com/files/international_3632.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [international.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106065316/http:/typophile.com/files/international_0.jpg) | 14.28 KB |
author: fripoinheffer

comments.content: It appears to be a lettering font named Fotura originated by Alphabet Innovations in 1969. I don't know of anyone who has done a digital version, so this may be available under another name.
